Posts.Content: Yes, definitely. When I saw a breast surgeon because I had some lumps in my breast, and swollen lymph nodes, she told me the most common cause of swollen lymph nodes in the armpit area is shaving (turns out for me, the lumps were the onset of fibrocystic breasts, and the lymph nodes were that I had mono but didn't know it yet). So, I would think most definitely it could cause it. Why don't you change back to your old razor and see if it goes away?
Posts.Title: Underarm Tenderness
